summary: Campus Energy Tile Dashboard project. Currently updating the app to show a 'No Device Connected' message instead of fake demo data until the real ESP32 hardware is connected.
architectural_notes: Dashboard currently uses simulated/demo data; real data comes from ESP32 hardware when connected

existing_features.title: Update SimulationControl component to display a prominent 'No Device Connected' status when no real sensor reading has been received from the ESP32 hardware, instead of showing a syncing or active state.

Remove all hardcoded/simulated demo sensor data from useQueries.ts (or wherever default mock values are injected). When no real reading exists, all data values must be null/undefined rather than fake numbers.

Update all dashboard panel components (SensorDataPanel, SensorReadingCards, AnalyticsCharts, BatteryLevelPanel, USBOutputStatusPanel, AIDecisionPanel, EnergyFlowDiagram, HexagonTilePanel) to render a clear 'No Device Connected' or 'Awaiting Hardware' placeholder state — instead of zeroed-out or default values — when sensor data is null/absent.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show 'No Device Connected' message instead of fake demo data until real ESP32 hardware is connected
